column4: why would I be able to connect to a given wifi with Win2k but not Ubuntu, drivers?
I mean both operating systems 'see' the connections, but Win2k, _always_ connects
wifi drivers can be really tricky to get working, I had to try three different ones on my desktop before I got mine working
I can connect, but the connections are horrible compaired to what I get on the same lappy rebooted to Win2k
